ygData.subject: Re: Exatcly how to do this.
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/10/99 7:08:38 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Heck... It may bee needed for some of the other classes... but I have not translated my necro
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/10/99 7:08:38 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
sz200@... writes:

> This doesn't make sense at all. So Magicians are the ONLY ones that have
> to go out and spend 6-20 platinum on an actual component (a spell) needed
> for research (which they may already have in their spellbook)?
>

Heck... It may bee needed for some of the other classes... but I have not
translated my necro books yet, so I do not know. All I can tell is some of
the later ones require three or four components... one of them MAY be a
spell. Give us time.

Sonoroud.
